column1: (Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 29 August 2024, for next 24 hours)
Showers  may  occur  at  times  in  the  sea  areas  off  the  coast  extending  from  Mullaittivu  to
Hambanthota via  Kankasanthurai, Puttalam, Colombo and Galle.
Winds will be south-westerly in direction and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

W
ind speed can increase up to (55-60) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending from
Kankasanthurai to Chilaw via Mannar and Puttalam and from Hambantota to Pottuvil.
Wind speed can increase up to 50 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending from
Chilaw to Hambantota via Colombo and Galle and from Trincomalee to Kankasanthurai.
The sea areas off the coasts extending from Kankasanthurai to Chilaw via Mannar and Puttalam
and from Hambantota to Pottuvil will be rough at times.

T
he sea areas off the coasts extending from Chilaw to Hambantota via Colombo and Galle and from
Trincomalee to Kankasanthurai may be fairly rough at times.
